title: Riot won't answer my support ticket
body: So my account got  suspended due to a charge back of $20 and I sent in a ticket with the pre paid riot card yet still no help. My first ticket was answered with just a response saying it will be transferred to billing and yet still nothing new. It's been almost 48 hours since I sent in my ticket :(, I just want my account back.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me except I paid for it with a PayPal and my account still isn't unlocked after 3 days of waiting and I even sent in a ticket with a picture of the payment and it's making me mad. >_<
I having problems with the Bulling Support Team, no response in days.
